posts.title: A brief history of Pako
posts.excerpt: About how Pako emerged and developed as an idea...
posts.content:
Pako started as a dream of a handful of people who believed in the freedom of cycling in the narrow streets of Kadıköy. In early 2019, it sprouted as an answer to the injustices in the delivery world.

Since day one, our aim has not only been to carry a package, but to keep the solidarity in our neighborhood alive.

posts.title: Commission-free delivery with Pako for businesses unable to work with platforms...
posts.excerpt: Official institutions cannot invoice the unfair commissions requested by platforms...
posts.content:
Many local tradesmen are crushed under commissions of up to 30%-40% imposed by large platforms. As Pako, we are changing this order.

Thanks to our commission-free model, businesses protect their earnings while our couriers receive the full reward for their labor.

posts.title: Trails are appearing
posts.excerpt: We opened a trail in our forests with our collective!...
posts.content:
We leave a mark not only in the city but also in nature. Last month, we opened new mountain bike trails for our youth in the Aydos forest.

Working together with picks and shovels, we created routes that are respectful and protected from nature.

posts.title: Bumps are not an obstacle with PakoBike
posts.excerpt: Speaking of local and customized production, we couldn't find a better production tool than the bicycle...
posts.content: Istanbul's roads are difficult. We needed a bicycle suitable for cobblestones and bumps. Our PakoBike, designed with our own couriers, is a total city beast.

posts.title: Tips for getting along well with your bicycle
posts.excerpt: Yes that's right you are in a serious relationship. We prepared this guide for you...
posts.content:
Your bike is your most loyal friend. But it also wants love and care. Don't neglect to lubricate your chain and check the brake pads.

In this guide, you will find simple but effective maintenance tips that will extend the life of your bike.

posts.title: We succeeded as a community
posts.excerpt: One of the most beautiful gifts of acting as a community...
posts.content: Kadıköy PKOOP cycling center has opened its doors! We now have a house where you can safely entrust your bikes, have them repaired and socialize with other cyclists.

posts.title: Tips for Carrying Cargo by Bicycle
posts.excerpt: Learn effective cargo carrying techniques by bicycle...
posts.content: Carrying load is an art. You need to know how to place the load for balance, safety and efficiency. Keeping the center of gravity low is the golden rule.

posts.title: Cycling in the Rain
posts.excerpt: Points to consider for safe cycling in wet weather...
posts.content: Rain is not an obstacle, just a condition. With the right equipment and technique, you can safely pedal on wet roads as well.

posts.title: Pako Rider User Manual
posts.excerpt: Detailed step-by-step guide to using the Pako Rider application...
posts.content:
Our new mobile application Pako Rider completely digitizes the workflow of our couriers.

We explained step by step how to use all the features such as task receiving and route tracking.

posts.title: Courier Experiences: In One Day
posts.excerpt: The story of a working day from the eyes of one of the Pako couriers...
posts.content:
How do we start the day? Pedaling in the silence of the neighborhood in the early hours of the morning is priceless.

We share the funny events we lived in a day, the difficulties and the peace brought by the tiredness at the end of the day.

businesses.title: Businesses

intro.title: Businesses
intro.description1: Businesses that give spirit to venues with their labor and inspire with their food constitute the highest priority audience for Pako, because Pako, which puts the concept of 'locality' at the very top of its principles, is a local community consisting of the neighborhood's cyclists as a culture. Our goal is to offer a fair and transparent working model to local tradesmen and couriers by combining the speed of the bicycle, the justice of the cooperative and the ease of technology.
intro.description2: Our decentralized system is transforming the courier model and developing towards making this model applicable in every district under all conditions. You can help us develop a principled working model by meeting and supporting Pako.
intro.description3: Pako, which has been providing training to many courier networks with the experience it has gained in the field since the pandemic period in 2019, has made decentralized and independent restaurant couriering technologically possible with the mobile application Pako Rider it developed.

businesses.heroStatement: Be a part of Pako's non-profit mission and social movement, strong ties with local producers.

localNetwork.title: Join the local network
localNetwork.description1: Pako feeds on Turkey's solidarist roots, locality and organicity. In a period when the unfair business order is on the rise, it offers a beneficial alternative to you precious tradesmen who produce value and are unique, and to local producers outside the global chain. By asking 'Is a different courier model possible?', it believes that the bicycle is the carrier of this model.
localNetwork.description2: Pako, which has been providing training to many courier networks with the experience it has gained in the field since the pandemic period in 2019, has made decentralized and independent restaurant couriering technologically possible with the mobile application Pako Rider it developed. Pako performs restaurant delivery without commission, Pako Rider acts as a 'pool' that lists the delivery jobs in the region. By receiving support from the bicycle Pako team in the region you serve, you contribute to the solidarity exhibiting a fair and transparent model.

principles.title: Cooperation principles
principles.description1: Pako is not a technology platform managed by a "boss", but by those who produce value with their labor. The culture, philosophy and business model of Pako must first be correctly understood by the Pako driver and the business it aims to establish a partnership with. Pako, feeding from Turkey's solidarist background, works on a voluntary basis and aims to protect this trust bond it has established with the business while using the bicycle as a tool.
principles.description2: The operator should be aware that they are supporting a principled movement and business model by establishing a cooperation with Pako. They should know that the Pako driver cares about every order and is expected to be steadfast and understanding in the face of possible disruptions.

pakoRider.title: Pako Rider
pakoRider.joinDesc: Learn the traditional Pako way and work without a boss in your own region.
pakoRider.description1: The Pako Rider application was developed as a digital reflection of organic field experience by bicycle couriers dedicated to Pako. Pako Rider is not just a delivery tool; it is a high-performance and transparent technology platform that draws its strength from the open-source philosophy. Developed by cyclists for cyclists with collective consciousness, the Pako Rider software is open source; it can be inspected and developed by everyone. The data flow is not secret. Its independent technology is a common value of the cooperative.
pakoRider.description2: Pako's courier-oriented technological vision produces solutions by observing courier needs directly in the field. This software aims to offer a fairer, more transparent and efficient working environment by shaping with the collective mind of the community; it builds a future where people, not algorithms, are priority.
pakoRider.heroTitle: Open source code, transparent data flow and honest economic models
pakoRider.interfaceDescription1: Developed by cyclists for cyclists with collective consciousness, the Pako Rider software is open source; it can be inspected and developed by everyone. Data flow is not secret. Its independent technology is the joint value of the cooperative.
pakoRider.interfaceDescription2: Pako Rider's new generation software approach creates a fast workflow, recommends works in the pool to couriers in the field in the most reasonable way with its organic advanced algorithm and creates smart routes. It is designed to help people working on a common task achieve their goals.
pakoRider.communityInvitation1: Join the movement we started with Pako Rider, join the community to get more information about our philosophy, principles and examine usage principles. Our goal is to make the use of Pako Rider possible and easier for everyone.
pakoRider.communityInvitation2: You will find all the guides you are looking for about the field orientation, Pako community system, field coordination and operation, and about the application there. Your participation is very valuable for the development of Pako Rider, we invite anyone who wants to develop a cyclist fair delivery system together to become a member of our community page.

about.title: What is Pako?
about.description1: Pako is a delivery ecosystem developed under the umbrella of PKOOP (Bossless Cooperative), focusing on solidarity economy and ecological transportation. Pako performs restaurant delivery and aims to bring restaurants and cyclists together and enable a transparent and fair delivery system for both sides. Unlike traditional courier platforms, Pako works with a "bossless" structure and positions bicycle couriers not as workers, but as partners and independent service providers of the platform. It cares about locality, neighborhood and mutual trust. It says that a sustainable and nature-friendly transportation model that does not prioritize profit and acts with collective wisdom is possible, and believes that the bicycle can be the carrier of this model; it offers a fast and ethical delivery alternative with its logistics network that reduces the carbon footprint to zero.
about.description2: Pako, which has a decentralized structure managed by the community, works to support fair working conditions and local economy.
about.heroTitle: Sustainable, commission-free collaborative and participatory working model
about.kolektifDesc: We take decisions together, we walk the path together.
about.yerelDesc: We establish strong bonds with tradesmen, producers and the neighborhood.
about.dogaDesc: We work with a sustainable mode of transport that has no carbon emissions.
about.seffafDesc: Every step we take is part of a trust we build together.
about.communityTitle: It is a voluntary community that makes Pako possible
about.communityDesc1: The continuity and development of Pako is the result of the hard work of a team whose principles overlap in many subjects. What we carry in Pako is not just packages, but a common culture. Pako works with the understanding of "festina lante" (hurry up but slowly) by adapting to the rhythm of the city; thus establishing stability that gives confidence to both businesses and the field. An approach that prepares the individual for the changes of life, teaches him economy from the core and trains his cognitive abilities as an entrepreneurship school is in Pako's nature. This form of existence makes our job a bit different from others.
about.communityDesc2: Pako is not for everyone; it is suitable for adventure lovers and nature people, but not for those who get away with things easily. In these contexts, the Pako rider is positioned outside the mainstream.

items.q: What does a Pako rider do?
items.a: The Pako rider takes on the delivery tasks from restaurants in the pool of the Pako Rider application and works on a voluntary basis. With the awareness of representing a collective, they offer solutions to their business partners with well-being.

items.q: What is the difference between Pako and other delivery platforms?
items.a: Pako does not perform platform couriering, it performs restaurant couriering. It is not a private company either, it is a community of cyclists. Pako Rider only lists local jobs. Pakos choose these jobs and they do not use motorized vehicles for the jobs they choose, they make deliveries by bicycle. Pako does not work with commission, it does not earn any income other than the return for its labor.

items.q: How can I become a Pako?
items.a: By being included in the community, you participate in a platform where we develop Pako-style life together and take the first step. You can get information about the field on our community page and start the orientation process.

Yes. Pako riders have professional equipment and follow safety standards supervised by the community. Bicycle is one of the safest means of transportation and accidents are not a common occurrence in Pako. Pako orientation is a process and trains the cyclist autonomously to develop their awareness not only in traffic but in every area of life.

cookiePolicy.description: This Cookie Policy explains how cookies and similar technologies are used on the Pako website.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files placed on your device when you visit a website. They help websites function more efficiently and remember user preferences.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies?
howWeUse.content1: At Pako, we use cookies minimally and only to improve your user experience:
howWeUse.item1: Remembering user settings such as dark mode and language preferences (using localStorage).
howWeUse.item2: Storing interface preferences such as sidebar state.
howWeUse.content2: Our website does not use third-party advertising or tracking cookies.

managing.title: How to Manage Cookies?
managing.content: You can delete or block cookies through your browser settings. However, in this case, some features may not work as expected.
